> 1\. (1 point) Create a function that takes a vector as an input, and returns a data frame with
> min, mean, median and max value.

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| error: false
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

```

```{r}
f <- function(x){
  df <- data.frame(
    mean = mean(x),
    median = median(x),
    maximum = max(x),
    minimum = min(x)
  )
  return(df)
}
vec <- c(1,5,6,8,14,6,3)
kbl(f(vec))
```
